jobs_results.title: Developer Mobile (iOS / Swift) [Remote]
jobs_results.description:
Developer Mobile (iOS / Swift)

(Festanstellung (m/w/d), Vollzeit, 100% Remote)– [#JR014] –

Wir bieten Dir
• Unbefristete Festanstellung und einen sicheren Arbeitsplatz
• Spannende und abwechslungsreiche Projekte
• Freiheit, Eigenverantwortlichkeit und Entfaltungsmöglichkeiten
• 100% Remote Work
• Flexible Arbeitszeiten
• Gute Bezahlung

Deine Mission
• Konzeption von iOS Apps und Client / Serverlösungen
• Umsetzung von nativen oder Hybrid iPhone / iPad Apps
• Entwicklung auf Basis XCode & Objective-C / Swift
• Mitentwicklung von REST Schnittstellen und APIs

Was du mitbringst
• Expertenwissen in Sachen iOS Entwicklung und Objective-C / Swift
• Erfahrung mit Javascript und HTML5, CSS
• Grundlegene Erfahrung mit REST & HTTP
• optional grundlegende Erfahrungen im Bereich der PHP / Framework / OOP Entwicklung

Du zeigst
• Motivation, Engagement und Teamfähigkeit
• Schnelle Auffassungsgabe und Planungsfähigkeiten
• Selbständige Arbeitsweise und Flexibilität
• den Willen die optimale Lösung zu schaffen

Interesse? Bewerbungen und Fragen einfach per eMail an: jobs@braindata.de

jobs_results.title: iOS developer
jobs_results.description:
We’re looking for the special, unique and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, team work.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

We are looking for an Amazing: iOS developer

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Remote in Portugal. The candidates must be already in Portugal.

The amazing you, will have:

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
- Experience as iOS developer for at least 4 years.
- Strong experience in Swift and Objective-C for iOS development.
- Proficiency in Reactive programming frameworks like RxSwift or Combine.
- Hands-on experience with the SwiftUI framework for building modern and intuitive user interfaces.
- Deep understanding of adaptive layouts and responsive design principles.
- Expertise in implementing MVVM architecture and adhering to design patterns.
- Knowledge of unit testing and maintaining quality gates for robust software development.
- Familiarity with SOLID principles and a commitment to writing clean, maintainable code.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail.
- Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
- Fluent in English is mandatory .

Why should you become part of our family?

- You can develop a career that fits you : your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
- Interesting Challenges Ahead : you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
- Free training programs : Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
- International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
- Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):- In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
- Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
- Full Onsite projects: if you prefere the company of your colleagues!

- Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psicologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Inovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

At KCS IT we defend equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for all employees!

We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit.

All applications with skills for the role are welcome!

jobs_results.title: Lead iOS Developer in a Dynamic Environment
jobs_results.description:
Company Overview: Irium Portugal is an innovative and growing company with a strong focus on professional development. Our dynamic and proactive team shares our values of responsibility and commitment to work quality.

About the Role: We are currently seeking a Lead iOS Developer with 4+ years of experience to join our team in Lisbon, Braga, or Coimbra. The ideal candidate will have solid knowledge of reactive programming (RxSwift or Combine), Objective-C, SwiftUI Framework, and Combine.

Key Responsibilities:
• Design and implement high-quality iOS applications using Swift and MVVM
• Leverage reactive programming frameworks like RxSwift or Combine to create efficient and scalable solutions
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration and deployment of applications
• Mentor junior developers and contribute to code reviews and technical guidance
• Publish applications in the App Store and manage dependencies using SPM/CocoaPods

Requirements:
• 4+ years of experience in iOS development
• Strong understanding of design patterns and SOLID principles
• Familiarity with principles of TDD and quality gates
• Experience with adaptive layout and publishing applications in the App Store
• Proficiency in Objective-C and SwiftUI Framework
• Knowledge of reactive programming frameworks like RxSwift or Combine

Benefits: As a valued member of our team, you can expect:
• A competitive salary range: €70,000 - €110,000 per year, depending on experience
• Flexible pay structure and medical insurance as a social benefit
• Unlimited access to technological training and professional development opportunities
• An inclusive and equal work environment that values diversity and equality for all employees

About Us: At Irium Portugal, we believe in building a future where everyone has equal opportunities and freedom from stereotypes. Our Equality Plan and Code of Ethics ensure that every employee receives equal treatment and opportunities, regardless of personal, physical, or social condition.

jobs_results.description: I'm seeking a seasoned Android(Kotlin) & iOS(Swift) Developer, boasting a minimum of 6 years experience, to build a dynamic Android application. Key Requirements: - Extensive experience in Android(Kotlin) & iOS(Swift) app development. - Deep understanding and expertise in integrating social media platforms, search functionalities - Mastery of implementing OAuth for user authentication, primarily through Google and Facebook. The primary feature of this application will be its social media integration. It should allow seamless sharing and connectivity with the aforementioned platforms. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in developing engaging, user-friendly Android applications with robust social media capabilities. Experience in implementing security measures for OAuth and creating a smooth, secure user authentication process is essential. Please include examples of previous, similar projects in your proposal. iPhone Mobile App Development Android iPad PhoneGap ID do Projeto: # Sobre o projeto 8 propostas Aberto para ofertas Projeto remoto Ativo em 15 minutos atrás

jobs_results.title: iOS Swift Developer
jobs_results.description:
Integer is a Portuguese consulting company specialized in Technology and Information Systems. Our core business is IT outsourcing services, software, nearshore projects, and tailor-made solutions. We are partners with the main technology players worldwide and we work with national and multinational companies from several industries. Most of the projects we participate are in Portugal, Brazil, and throughout Europe. What set us apart is the experience of our team and our tech talent.

Are you looking for new opportunities in the IT area? We have news for you!

This could be the perfect challenge if you have:
• +5 years of experience in iOS development using Swift.
• Strong knowledge of the iOS SDK and frameworks like UIKit, Foundation, and Core Animation.
• Experience with software architectures such as MVC, MVVM, or VIPER.
• Proficiency in building responsive interfaces using Storyboard, XIBs, and Auto Layout.
• Familiarity with RESTful APIs integration and backend communication.
• Knowledge of Git and dependency management tools (CocoaPods or Swift Package Manager).
• Experience with push notifications (Firebase or APNs).
• Understanding of unit testing and tools like XCTest.
• Familiarity with CI/CD processes and app publishing in the App Store.
• Good understanding of agile methodologies (Scrum or Kanban).
• Strong communication and teamwork skills.
• Fluency in English (spoken and written).

If you have the desired amazINg tech talent and want to be part of the INTEGER team, respond to this ad with your updated CV to

To learn more about how we protect your privacy, please see our Policy at
